attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only have Fireworks public displays and to ban fireworks sold to the public, in Shops - and only have the displays on the 5TH of November and New Years eve which will be public displays only.
People miss use fireworks which are sold to the public and is a carbon footprint.
